title: Cyberlink Power2Go 9 Platinum 9.0.0809.0 (cracks) [ChingLiu]
description:
Complete Disc Burning & Copying for DVDs and Blu-rays

Power2Go 9 delivers reliable, high-performance disc burning & copying for CDs, DVDs and Blu-ray discs. Burn all your data, rip and covert music and create exciting video DVDs. Download and back up your photos and video from YouTube, Facebook and more. Easy-to-use and packed with innovative features, Power2Go is the smart choice for all your disc burning needs.

Burn to Any Disc

Create personal compilations : Power2GoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s advanced burning engine makes it a snap to burn CDs, DVDs and Blu-ray discs Ã¢â‚¬â€ even the latest 128GB BDXL discs. Create personal compilations with drag-and-drop ease. 

Span data across discs : When you have more data to burn than will fit on one disc, Power2Go automatically splits the project across multiple discs. Disc spanning works with CDs, DVDs and Blu-ray Discs. 

Copy discs & create disc images : Duplicate CDs, unprotected DVDs and Blu-ray discs by burning 1:1 copies of your discs. Save a copy of a disc to your hard drive as a disc image and burn disc images back to disc.

Drag-drop-burn : It doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t get much easier than the Desktop Burning Gadget. Choose the kind of disc you want to burn and drag files, discs, music or video to the gadget. Your disc is just clicks away

Protect your system 

Hard drive crashes happen all too often. And at the worst time. Power2Go helps you protect your computer by letting you create a full backup of your Windows system and the data on your system drive. To restore your computer after a failure, simply insert the system recovery disc and let the Power2Go System Recovery Wizard take control. 

Create Photo and Video Discs

Create music discs of your favorite tunes : Power2Go lets you make music discs for any occasion. From audio CDs to play in any home machine to long-playing MP3 / WMA DVDs able to fit hundreds of songs, you have everything you need to keep the music playing.

NEW! Create original quality audio CDs from CUE files.

Share video on DVD : Your video is in good hands with Power2Go. Create terrific-looking DVDs and VCDs using CyberLink's award-winning authoring tools. Choose from ready-to-use menus and customize with your own music and text. 

Bring photos to life : Create Photo Gallery discs that run on your PC. Easily browse photo collections or play slideshows complete with music. With support for text and Internet links, Photo Gallery discs are perfect for company profiles and catalogues.

Explore Valuable Extras

ISO toolkit - Mount ISO discs and ISO Viewer : Mount a disc image file as a virtual drive on your PC for continuous access. Browse contents from ISO image files with a handy ISO Viewer. Grab files from ISO images as if you are reading files from a disc.

CyberLink WaveEditor 2 - Full featured audio editing : CyberLink WaveEditor is an invaluable program that lets you record, trim, cut, mix, and enhance digital audio with rich effects. Save tracks in different formats and create audio CDs. Intelligent integration means you can send audio tracks directly to WaveEditor from the main program for editing before you burn. 

Rip and convert audio : Turn audio CDs into MP3 or WMA music files that are easy to take on the go. Or create lossless FLAC or APE copies of your music for best-qualilty backups. Power2Go gives you the freedom to keep music close at hand wherever you go. 

LabelPrint - The fun way to create stylish disc labels : CyberLink LabelPrint is label-making software that lets you design and print stylish CD/DVD labels in 4 easy steps. Just select your template type, disc information, text layout, background image, and print destination. LabelPrint supports layout and printing on a broad range of templates for your CD/DVD labels from leading label brands. 

Minimum System Requirements 

Operating System
- Microsoft WindowsÃ‚Â® 8, 7, Vista and XP
- Windows Media Player version 9 or above installed
- Internet Explorer 8 or above

Screen Resolution 
-1024 x 768 pixels 

Memory 
-128 MB SDRAM for data and music burning
- 256 MB DDR RAM for video burning (512 MB recommended)

CPU
- CD/VCD (MPEG-1) production: Intel Pentium II 450
- DVD (MPEG-2) production: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz, or AMD Athlon 700 MHz (Intel Pentium 4 2.0 GHz, AMD Athlon 2100+ or above recommended)

Hard Disc Space 
- 1 GB for making VCDs
- 5-10 GB for making DVDs
- 25 GB for making Blu-ray Discs
